TopicTitle: Near Future Tech vs. KSP Interstellar - Extended

Articles.Content:
I've used Fractal's KSPI, but it seems like that forked into a half dozen different things. The only KSPI derivative that seems to be updated anymore is KSP Interstellar - Extended. I played KSPI because it seemed like a nice end-game thing that helped fill out some of the later game stages. However, looking at the installation for KSPI-E, I'm thinking its a good time to revisit which of these two late game mods I would like to install. So what do people like to use and why? Do people prefer one or the other or both? Does that even work well(using both together)? How stable are they? Is KSPI-E's installation as bad as it seems? How well do they fill out the tech tree/late game? Any other end game type mods out there I should consider? (Besides OKS/MKS which I already have).

Thanks

Note I have uploaded KSPI Extended which includes support for Near Future Tech

Edited October 15, 2015 by FreeThinker
